job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtwho we areltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are a part of emerging technologies and incubation group passionate about identifying breakthrough emerging solutions that build new markets and businesses for cisco we incubate these new opportunities in partnership with our business groups partners and other startups the team also continues to progress ciscos important work with standards bodies and manage research partnerships with leadingedge universitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtwhat youll doltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtas an sre team member you will be responsible for crafting and evolving the environments tooling and practices used by continually evolving application teams as they transform research ideas into products that will be taken to market to make a significant difference for cisco and the industry specifically you willltbrgtltbrgtuse sound systems design to deliver available observable and scalable common servicesltbrgtltbrgtcollaborate with our partners from the multiple application teams who are demonstrating our services working to ensure their successltbrgtltbrgtparticipate in evaluations and build vs buy decisions across open source and the greater cisco community for each service required as well as its implementation including deployment monitoring and evolutionltbrgtltbrgtdevelop software code scripts and configuration to optimally and repeatedly deploy monitor and evolve servicesltbrgtltbrgtdevelop standards and practices used by all teams application and platform to build operable servicesltbrgtltbrgtparticipate in the oncall rotation for the services delivered by the sreplatform teamltbrgtltbrgtparticipate in incident command assisting application service owners with triage remediation and postmortems for their incidents ensuring lessons learned are implemented across all teamsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtwho youll work withltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtthe emerging technologies and incubation etampampi team is a highly visible group which reports directly to ciscos ceo etampampi focuses on the next wave of innovation by anticipating investing in and incubating new technologies and business venturesltbrgtltbrgtyou will be part of the incubation team in the us to develop new solutions and bring them to market in a startup like environmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtwho you areltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtstartup experience strongly preferred you have worked in startups or startup ventures within larger organizationsltbrgtltbrgtoutstanding verbal and written communication skillsltbrgtltbrgtsystemslevel thinker you consider where a problem should be solved not just howltbrgtltbrgtability to thrive in a multifaceted everchanging environmentltbrgtltbrgtwillingness to lead and do while this is an individual contributor role you will be responsible for taking the initiative to drive your own projects to completion as well as ensuring the success of those who you are building forltbrgtltbrgtexpertise and experience in delivering largescale systems using cloud technologies including but not limited to public cloud platforms such as gcp azure ampamp awsltbrgtltbrgtwell versed with engineering qa and technical operations practices with agile application development and delivery vehiclesltbrgtltbrgt years experience with software development we build repeatable systems through automationltbrgtltbrgt years experience with devops or infrastructureascode tools such as puppet chef ansible or terraformltbrgtltbrgtbachelors degree in computer science cis engineering or related field or equivalent experienceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe are ciscoltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwearecisco where each person is unique but we bring our talents to work as a team and make a difference heres how we do itltbrgtltbrgtwe embrace digital and help our customers implement change in their digital businesses some may think were old years strong and only about hardware but were also a software company and a security company an aimachine learning company we even invented an intuitive network that adapts predicts learns and protects no other company can do what we do you cant put us in a boxltbrgtltbrgtbut digital transformation is an empty buzz phrase without a culture that allows for innovation creativity and yes even failure if you learn from itltbrgtltbrgtday to day we focus on the give and take we give our best we give our egos a break and we give of ourselves because giving back is built into our dna we take accountability we take bold steps and we take difference to heart because without diversity of thought and a commitment to equality for all there is no moving forwardltbrgtltbrgtso you have colorful hair dont care tattoos show off your ink like polka dots thats cool
